attributes.action: Help Vauxhall realise there wrong over the intelilink system
attributes.additional_details: Lots of owners have emailed Vauxhall to express there opinion only to be told there is nothing that can be done and our systems are now rendered as obsolete, with no updates, no new apps but if needed they will repair any issues with that system. These are brand new cars that have been mis-sold on the pretence of us getting updates and no mention of a new system coming out a few months later
attributes.background: MY15 model corsa's came with an intelilink radio system, we were told system updates and more apps would be available. They have now bought out the MY16 models with version 4.0 intelilink and we have been told we won't get any updates or apps

rejection.details: This seems to be the responsibility of Vauxhall, not the Government or Parliament.
